DateTime::Locale::vai(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DateTime::Locale::vai(3)

NAME

DateTime::Locale::vai - Locale data examples for the Vai (vai) locale

DESCRIPTION

This pod file contains examples of the locale data available for the Vai locale.

Days

Wide (format) 

  ꗳꗡꘉ
  ꕚꕞꕚ
  ꕉꕞꕒ
  ꕉꔤꕆꕢ
  ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  ꔻꔬꔳ
  ꕞꕌꔵ

Abbreviated (format)

  ꗳꗡꘉ
  ꕚꕞꕚ
  ꕉꕞꕒ
  ꕉꔤꕆꕢ
  ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  ꔻꔬꔳ
  ꕞꕌꔵ

Narrow (format)

  M
  T
  W
  T
  F
  S
  S

Wide (stand-alone)

  ꗳꗡꘉ
  ꕚꕞꕚ
  ꕉꕞꕒ
  ꕉꔤꕆꕢ
  ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  ꔻꔬꔳ
  ꕞꕌꔵ

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  ꗳꗡꘉ
  ꕚꕞꕚ
  ꕉꕞꕒ
  ꕉꔤꕆꕢ
  ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  ꔻꔬꔳ
  ꕞꕌꔵ

Narrow (stand-alone)

  M
  T
  W
  T
  F
  S
  S

Months

Wide (format) 

  ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꔞꔀꕮꕊ
  ꕒꕡꖝꖕ
  ꕾꖺ
  ꖢꖕ
  ꖑꕱ
  ꖱꘋ
  ꖱꕞꔤ
  ꗛꔕ
  ꕢꕌ
  ꕭꖃ
  ꔞꘋꕔꕿ ꕸꖃꗏ
  ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ

Abbreviated (format)

  ꖨꖕꔞ
  ꕒꕡ
  ꕾꖺ
  ꖢꖕ
  ꖑꕱ
  ꖱꘋ
  ꖱꕞ
  ꗛꔕ
  ꕢꕌ
  ꕭꖃ
  ꔞꘋ
  ꖨꖕꗏ

  Q2

Eras

Wide (format) 

  BCE
  CE

Abbreviated (format)

  BCE
  CE

Narrow (format)

  BCE
  CE

Date Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, 5 ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, 22 ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, 15 ꕢꕌ -10

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 ꕢꕌ -10

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 ꕒꕡ 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 ꖨꖕꗏ 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 ꕢꕌ -10

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05/02/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/09/-10

Time Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM

Datetime Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, 5 ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 2008 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, 22 ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 1995 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, 15 ꕢꕌ -10 4:44:23 AM UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 2008 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 1995 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 ꕢꕌ -10 4:44:23 AM UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 ꕒꕡ 2008 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 ꖨꖕꗏ 1995 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 ꕢꕌ -10 4:44:23 AM

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 05/02/2008 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/1995 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/09/-10 4:44 AM

Available Formats

Bh (h B) 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 B

Bhm (h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 B

Bhms (h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 B

E (ccc)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ

EBhm (E h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 4:44 B

EBhms (E h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 4:44:23 B

EHm (E HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 04:44

EHms (E HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 04:44:23

Ed (d, E)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5, ꕚꕞꕚ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22, ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15, ꔻꔬꔳ

Ehm (E h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 4:44 AM

Ehms (E h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ 4:44:23 AM

Gy (G y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = CE 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = CE 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = BCE -10

GyMMM (G y MMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = CE 2008 ꕒꕡ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = CE 1995 ꖨꖕꗏ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = BCE -10 ꕢꕌ

GyMMMEd (G y MMM d, E)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = CE 2008 ꕒꕡ 5, ꕚꕞꕚ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = CE 1995 ꖨꖕꗏ 22, ꕉꔤꕀꕮ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = BCE -10 ꕢꕌ 15, ꔻꔬꔳ

GyMMMd (G y MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = CE 2008 ꕒꕡ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = CE 1995 ꖨꖕꗏ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = BCE -10 ꕢꕌ 15

H (HH)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04

Hm (HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44

Hms (HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

Hmsv (HH:mm:ss v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Hmv (HH:mm v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44 UTC

M (L)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9

MEd (E, M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, 9/15

MMM (LLL)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕒꕡ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꖨꖕꗏ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꕢꕌ

MMMEd (E, MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, ꕒꕡ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, ꖨꖕꗏ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, ꕢꕌ 15

MMMMEd (E, MMMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, ꕢꕌ 15

MMMMW-count-other ('week' W 'of' MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = week 1 of ꕒꕡꖝꖕ
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 3 of ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 2 of ꕢꕌ

MMMMd (MMMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꕢꕌ 15

MMMd (MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕒꕡ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꖨꖕꗏ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꕢꕌ 15

Md (M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/15

d (d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15

h (h a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 AM

hm (h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM

hms (h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM

hmsv (h:mm:ss a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM UTC

hmv (h:mm a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM UTC

ms (mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 44:23

y (y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10

yM (M/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/-10

yMEd (E, M/d/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, 2/5/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, 12/22/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, 9/15/-10

yMMM (MMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕒꕡ 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꖨꖕꗏ 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꕢꕌ -10

yMMMEd (E, MMM d, y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕚꕞꕚ, ꕒꕡ 5, 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꕉꔤꕀꕮ, ꖨꖕꗏ 22, 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꔻꔬꔳ, ꕢꕌ 15, -10

yMMMM (MMMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = ꕒꕡꖝꖕ 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = ꖨꖕ ꕪꕴ ꗏꖺꕮꕊ 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = ꕢꕌ -10

yMMMd (y MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 ꕒꕡ 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 ꖨꖕꗏ 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 ꕢꕌ 15

yMd (y-MM-dd)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008-02-05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995-12-22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10-09-15

yQQQ (QQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Q1 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Q4 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Q3 -10

yQQQQ (QQQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Q1 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Q4 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Q3 -10

yw-count-other ('week' w 'of' Y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = week 6 of 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 51 of 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 37 of -10

Miscellaneous

Prefers 24 hour time?

No

Local first day of the week

1 (ꗳꗡꘉ)

SUPPORT

See DateTime::Locale.
